Ensure all technical resources, facilities, and equipment are properly maintained, operational, and prepared for live production demands including talent home studios and location cameras. Work with the DC Bureau Chief on emergency planning and disaster recovery protocols. Monitor and manage budgets related to staff labor, freelance support, and operational expenses. Independently lead and manage special projects such as multi-camera remote productions, ensuring they are delivered on time and within budget. Demonstrated ability to manage technical teams and coordinate resources effectively under tight deadlines. Strong organizational, communication, and problem-solving skills. Strong interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills. Proven ability to manage multiple priorities and deadlines in a high-pressure, fast-paced environment. Flexibility to work early mornings, late evenings, weekends, holidays, and travel as required. Commitment to fostering a safe, inclusive, and equitable work environment. Title: Vice President, Platform Distribution & Partnerships
RoleDescription: About Platform Distribution & Partnerships: Platform Distribution and Partnerships is a division of NBCUniversal's media group responsible for the distribution and monetization of the companys multi-billion-dollar linear and streaming services portfolio to pay-tv providers, NBC broadcast affiliates, consumer technology platforms and devices, and consumer brands. A key revenue-generator, the division is comprised of content distribution, affiliate relations and strategic partnerships across NBC, Peacock, Bravo, Telemundo and various FAST channels. The Vice President, Platform Distribution & Partnerships will report to the Executive Vice President, Platform Distribution & Partnerships and lead a team responsible for managing and growing MVPD, vMVPD and FAST distribution. This role oversees the negotiation, execution, and ongoing management of distribution agreements across major MVPDs, vMVPDs and FAST platforms for NBC networks and Peacock. The Vice President will drive strategic partner initiatives from incubation through implementation, ensuring strong execution and alignment with business objectives. This is a highly cross-functional role with touchpoints across Marketing, Product, Technology, Legal, Finance, Decision Sciences, Ad Sales, and Operations, requiring deep collaboration to maximize partner impact and optimize distribution strategies.Responsibilities include, but are not limited to:Lead negotiations and execution of distribution agreements for services across a diverse portfolio of platform partners, including MVPDs, vMVPDs and FAST platforms. Oversee and manage a team, providing strategic direction, mentorship, and professional development opportunities to maximize performance and impact. Develop and implement comprehensive partnership strategies to drive subscriber acquisition, engagement, and revenue growth for NBCUs suite products. Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with distribution partners, serving as a key point of contact to align on mutual goals, drive execution, and resolve challenges. Collaborate cross-functionally with internal stakeholdersincluding marketing, product, content, finance, and legalto support partnership initiatives, ensure operational excellence, and deliver on key business objectives. Analyze market trends, competitive dynamics, and platform performance to identify new growth opportunities, refine strategies, and inform decision-making. Structure, model, and evaluate partnership agreements to optimize terms and drive measurable business impact, balancing short-term objectives with long-term strategic positioning. Act as a thought leader within the organization, influencing internal stakeholders and advocating for innovative distribution approaches to maximize reach and engagement. Represent NBCUniversal at external meetings, industry events and partner engagements, reinforcing the companys position as a leader in media distribution. Required Qualifications:Minimum of 10+ years of experience in business development, partnerships, or digital media distribution within the television, film, or streaming industry. Extensive experience negotiating complex distribution agreements and managing high-profile partner relationships.Direct experience with MVPD and vMVPD agreements and negotiations.Demonstrated knowledge of the media landscape, business models, and evolving consumer behaviors in television and digital media. Proven ability to lead teams, fostering professional growth and a high-performance culture.Demonstrated strong understanding of the entertainment industry and NBCUniversals content and distribution ecosystem.Desired Characteristics:Experience with FAST channels a plus.Strong written and verbal communication skills and the ability to effectively present to senior leadership and external partners. Ability to operate in a fast-paced, constantly evolving environment, demonstrating adaptability, problem-solving skills, and a results-driven mindset. Strong strategic thinker with experience structuring creative partnership agreements that balance financial, operational, and strategic objectives. Highly organized and capable of managing multiple projects and stakeholders while maintaining focus on business priorities and execution excellence.MBA or JD a plus but not required.
